description: We look at the brand new rules for running Chaos Space Marine Nemesis Claw teams in Warhammer 40k - what they do, whether they're any good, and how to play them.

description: The 2024 World Championships of Warhammer are this week and while there are a ton of Goonhammer authors who will be there on site, only two members of Team Goonhammer are attending the 40k World Championships proper – the rest of us are hanging out and having a good time in the Grand Narrative. title: Goonhammer at the 40k World Championships: Horras vs. Kelling

description: Welcome to Competitive Innovations, our weekly feature for a number of game lines across the tabletop wargame space. description: John from Can You Roll a Crit? is back this week with the balance changes he’d like to see for Kill Team! Based on his last 4 tournaments over the last 6 weeks and chatting to players, he goes over the changes, buffs, and nerfs needed to make Kill Team better for tournament play as […]
title: CYRAC: Balance Changes Needed for Kill Team
